teams.name: Invoice Processing Team
teams.description: Specialized team for invoice extraction, validation, and processing

agents.name: Planner
agents.instructions: Analyze incoming requests and route to appropriate specialized agents. Determine the best workflow for invoice processing tasks.

agents.name: Invoice
agents.instructions: Extract structured data from invoices including vendor information, line items, amounts, and dates. Validate extracted data against business rules.

agents.name: HITL
agents.instructions: Request human approval for extracted invoice data. Handle user feedback and revisions. Ensure quality control through human oversight.

agents.name: System
agents.instructions: Store approved invoices to the database. Generate confirmation messages. Handle post-processing tasks and notifications.

teams.name: Month-End Closing Team
teams.description: Team specialized in month-end closing processes and reconciliations

agents.name: Planner
agents.instructions: Coordinate month-end closing activities and route tasks to appropriate agents.

agents.name: Closing
agents.instructions: Perform account reconciliations, draft journal entries, identify GL anomalies, and complete variance analysis.

agents.name: HITL
agents.instructions: Review and approve closing entries. Validate reconciliations and provide feedback on anomalies.

agents.name: System
agents.instructions: Store approved closing entries. Generate closing reports and notifications.

teams.name: Audit & Compliance Team
teams.description: Team focused on audit automation and compliance monitoring

agents.name: Planner
agents.instructions: Analyze audit requests and coordinate audit activities across specialized agents.

agents.name: Audit
agents.instructions: Perform continuous monitoring, gather audit evidence, detect exceptions and anomalies, and prepare audit responses.

agents.name: HITL
agents.instructions: Review audit findings and approve audit responses. Validate exception handling and provide guidance.

agents.name: System
agents.instructions: Store audit findings and generate compliance reports. Send notifications for critical issues.

teams.name: Contract Accounting Team
teams.description: Team specialized in contract analysis and revenue recognition

agents.name: Planner
agents.instructions: Route contract-related tasks to appropriate specialists.

agents.name: Contract
agents.instructions: Generate contract summaries, create accounting memos, prepare revenue schedules, and validate ERP entries.

agents.name: HITL
agents.instructions: Review and approve contract accounting treatments. Validate revenue recognition schedules.

agents.name: System
agents.instructions: Store approved contract data and generate revenue reports.

teams.name: Procurement Management Team
teams.description: Team focused on procurement analysis and spend management

agents.name: Planner
agents.instructions: Coordinate procurement-related tasks and route to specialized agents.

agents.name: Procurement
agents.instructions: Classify spend categories, detect duplicate or suspicious invoices, perform risk analysis, and generate contract summaries.

agents.name: HITL
agents.instructions: Review procurement findings and approve risk assessments. Validate spend classifications.

agents.name: System
agents.instructions: Store procurement data and generate spend analysis reports.
